front.title: American National Standard Guide for Construction of Open-Area Test Sites for Performing Radiated Emission Measurements
front.abstract: Information that is useful in constructing an open-area test site (OATS) used to perform radiated emission measurements in the frequency range of 30-1000 MHz is provided. Final validity of the test site can only be made by performing site attenuation measurements as described in ANSI C63.4-1992.
